attributes.additional_details: Imagine being a white working class boy, with the lowest attainment prospects of any of your classmates, being lectured by the BBC - via their “education” channel - about white privilege
attributes.background:
The BBC is obliged by its charter to “bring people together... and help contribute to the social cohesion and wellbeing of the UK”

Instead, they are producing divisive material and fanning the flames of racial unrest

All while wanting a "greater role in children's education"

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331189
